participant_1.background:

my hair is very long.
i go to a private high school.

my favorite animal is the koala.

i don t have too many friends in the us yet , but i am going to summer camp and i hope to make friends then ! i also think that i may make friends as soccer in the fall.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.

content.text: I'm doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
Oh, that's awful! I'm so sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's been a tough day, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's the best thing to do. It's good to have a support system, too. Are you close with your family?
Yes, I'm very close with my family. They're a great support system.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you have them.
Thanks. I'm also going to start seeing a therapist to help me deal with this.
That's a great idea. Therapy can be really helpful.
Thanks. I'm hoping it will be.
I'm sure it will. Just remember, you're not alone. There are people who care about you and want to help you through this.
